```py
>>> element = 2*np.arange(4).reshape((2, 2))
>>> element
array([[0, 2],
 [4, 6]])
>>> test_elements = [1, 2, 4, 8]
>>> mask = np.isin(element, test_elements)
>>> mask
array([[False,  True],
 [ True, False]])
>>> element[mask]
array([2, 4]) 
```

```py
>>> mask = np.isin(element, test_elements, invert=True)
>>> mask
array([[ True, False],
 [False,  True]])
>>> element[mask]
array([0, 6]) 
```

```py
>>> test_set = {1, 2, 4, 8}
>>> np.isin(element, test_set)
array([[False, False],
 [False, False]]) 
```

```py
>>> np.isin(element, list(test_set))
array([[False,  True],
 [ True, False]]) 
```
